li.p: Starting from version 7.0.0, Windows desktop application testing is available on Katalon Studio.

section.title: closeApplication

ul.li: Description: Trigger a closing event of the running application on the Windows System. This action is similar to pressing ALT + F4 and does not force the application to close. If there is a pop-up confirmation, you need to take some extra steps to actually close it.

section.codeblock:
"Start the note pad application" Windows.startApplication('C:\\Windows\\System32\\notepad.exe')
"Close note pad application" Windows.closeApplication()
